TITLE: Episode 92 - Monica Perez and the Tale of the Sacrificial Wolf [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by my very best buddy, Monica Perez of the Propaganda Report. We're going to talk current events, what's going on behind the teleprompter, and how baddies are taken down in theatrical ways and how that effects the little guy. Join us for what always ends up being a great time.
